allow: Bash(for file in ProfilePage.tsx Particuliers/*.tsx Professionnels/*.tsx Sportifs/*.tsx ConsultantsPage.tsx AppointmentBookingPage.tsx AproposPage.tsx)
Bash(do sed -i "s/mt: { xs: ''23px'', md: ''53px'' }/mt: { xs: ''23px'', md: ''40px'' }/g" "$file")
Bash(for file in ModuleAdultes.tsx ModuleCouples.tsx ModuleEnfants.tsx ModuleSuiviAnnuel.tsx)
